price: Dan kamu tidak menyalahkan kami, melainkan karena kami telah beriman kepada ayat-ayat Tuhan kami ketika ayat-ayat itu datang kepada kami".  (Mereka berdo`a), "Ya Tuhan kami, limpahkanlah kesabaran kepada kami dan wafatkanlah kami dalam keadaan berserah diri (kepada-Mu)".
arabic: وَمَا تَنقِمُ مِنَّآ إِلَّآ أَنۡ ءَامَنَّا بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّنَا لَمَّا جَآءَتۡنَاۚ رَبَّنَآ أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَبۡرٗا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā tanqimu minnā illā an āmannā biāyāti rabbinā lammā jāatnā rabbanā afrigh ʿalaynā ṣabran watawaffanā mus'limīna
